data.name: Aatrox
data.title: the Darkin Blade
data.quote: I must destroy even hope…

data.name: Ahri
data.title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
data.quote: Human emotions can be more volatile than even the deepest magic.

data.name: Akali
data.title: the Rogue Assassin
data.quote: If you look dangerous, you better be dangerous.

data.name: Akshan
data.title: the Rogue Sentinel
data.quote: Not everything happens for a reason. Some things need to be sorted out.

data.name: Alistar
data.title: the Minotaur
data.quote: Nothing can hold me back!

data.name: Amumu
data.title: the Sad Mummy
data.quote: Solitude can be lonelier than death.

data.name: Anivia
data.title: the Cryophoenix
data.quote: I am the fury of the blizzard, the bite of the wind, and the cold of the ice. I am the Freljord.

data.name: Annie
data.title: the Dark Child
data.quote: Ashes, ashes, they all fall down.

data.name: Aphelios
data.title: the Weapon of the Faithful
data.quote: Our faith is proven fate each time we deny it.

data.name: Ashe
data.title: the Frost Archer
data.quote: One tribe, one people, one Freljord.

data.name: Aurelion Sol
data.title: The Star Forger
data.quote: Cower. Worship. Marvel. They are all appropriate responses.

data.name: Azir
data.title: the Emperor of the Sands
data.quote: Shurima was once the glory of Runeterra. I will make it so again.

data.name: Bardo
data.title: the Wandering Caretaker
data.quote: The chimes of his footsteps are echoes of change.

data.name: Bel'Veth
data.title: the Empress of the Void
data.quote: This world will not be forgotten. I will replace it—a child devouring its parent.

data.name: Blitzcrank
data.title: the Great Steam Golem
data.quote: A SINGLE GEAR TURNING CAN MAKE ALL THE DIFFERENCE.

data.name: Brand
data.title: the Burning Vengeance
data.quote: This place will burn, not by cinder flying or breath of wind, but by the vengeance of my hand.

data.name: Braum
data.title: the Heart of the Freljord
data.quote: Today, we fight as enemies. Tomorrow, we may fight as brothers.

data.name: Caitlyn
data.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
data.quote: To be the best hunter, you have to be able to think like your prey.

data.name: Camille
data.title: the Steel Shadow
data.quote: Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon.

data.name: Cassiopeia
data.title: the Serpent's Embrace
data.quote: Secrets are sharper than blades…

data.name: Cho'Gath
data.title: the Terror of the Void
data.quote: Your souls will feed the Void!

data.name: Corki
data.title: the Daring Bombardier
data.quote: Death from above!

data.name: Darius
data.title: the Hand of Noxus
data.quote: History only remembers the victors. Stand with Noxus, and be remembered forever.

data.name: Diana
data.title: Scorn of the Moon
data.quote: I am the light coursing in the soul of the moon.

data.name: Draven
data.title: the Glorious Executioner
data.quote: The best' is wherever I decide to set the bar each day.

data.name: Dr. Mundo
data.title: the Madman of Zaun
data.quote: Me must be good doctor. Patients never come back.

data.name: Ekko
data.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
data.quote: My devices work best when they don’t work as intended… which is most of the time.

data.name: Elise
data.title: the Spider Queen
data.quote: Beauty is power too, and can strike swifter than any sword.

data.name: Evelynn
data.title: Agony's Embrace
data.quote: What are you doing tonight? How about we get together and unlock that vast well of torment inside you?

data.name: Ezreal
data.title: the Prodigal Explorer
data.quote: If I don’t know the rules, then how can I be breaking them?

data.name: Fiddlesticks
data.title: the Ancient Fear
data.quote: It's hunting us. It knows what we're afraid of.

data.name: Fiora
data.title: the Grand Duelist
data.quote: I have come to kill you for the sake of honor. And though you possess none, still you die.

data.name: Fizz
data.title: the Tidal Trickster
data.quote: You people can’t even breathe water. You’re boring.

data.name: Galio
data.title: the Colossus
data.quote: Get behind me, Demacian! You may not have noticed, but I’m very large.

data.name: Gangplank
data.title: the Saltwater Scourge
data.quote: I was cutting throats and sinking Noxian war galleys when you were still pissing your britches, boy. You don’t want to take me on.

data.name: Garen
data.title: The Might of Demacia
data.quote: This kingdom, and its people, have given me everything. What kind of man would I be if I gave any less in return?

data.name: Gnar
data.title: the Missing Link
data.quote: Gnar!

data.name: Gragas
data.title: the Rabble Rouser
data.quote: Now this'll put hair on your chest!

data.name: Graves
data.title: the Outlaw
data.quote: We’re here for your gold, not your heads… so don’t nobody decide to be a hero.

data.name: Gwen
data.title: The Hallowed Seamstress
data.quote: The wind at my back feels so good. I can’t lose this. I won’t.

data.name: Hecarim
data.title: the Shadow of War
data.quote: Break their ranks, and ride them down without mercy. Crush the living. Feast on their terror.

data.name: Heimerdinger
data.title: the Revered Inventor
data.quote: Impossible, you say? Nonsense. Just wait till you see my calculations!

data.name: Illaoi
data.title: the Kraken Priestess
data.quote: Wisdom is frequently a kick in the head.

data.name: Irelia
data.title: the Blade Dancer
data.quote: There was a time when I danced only for myself. Now, I dance for the First Lands.

data.name: Ivern
data.title: the Green Father
data.quote: The cleverness of mushrooms always surprises me.

data.name: Janna
data.title: the Storm's Fury
data.quote: Do not fear the winds of change—they will always be at your back.

data.name: Jarvan IV
data.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
data.quote: Words may make a ruler, but only actions make history.

data.name: Jax
data.title: Grandmaster at Arms
data.quote: Strength and will are what make a weapon.

data.name: Jayce
data.title: the Defender of Tomorrow
data.quote: Picking a fight with me is the dumbest thing you’ve done today - and that’s saying a lot.

data.name: Jhin
data.title: the Virtuoso
data.quote: Art requires a certain… cruelty.

data.name: Jinx
data.title: the Loose Cannon
data.quote: Volatile explosives are a girl’s best friend!

data.name: Kai'Sa
data.title: Daughter of the Void
data.quote: My appearance may frighten you, but make no mistake—I am on your side, and we fight to the bitter end.

data.name: Kalista
data.title: the Spear of Vengeance
data.quote: Turncoats, oath breakers and betrayers… we hate them all.

data.name: Karma
data.title: the Enlightened One
data.quote: As Ionia changes, so must I.

data.name: Karthus
data.title: the Deathsinger
data.quote: Death is not the end of the journey, it is just the beginning...

data.name: Kassadin
data.title: the Void Walker
data.quote: There are few indeed who may tread the paths between worlds.

data.name: Katarina
data.title: the Sinister Blade
data.quote: Never question my loyalty. You will never know what I endure for it.

data.name: Kayle
data.title: the Righteous
data.quote: No human is perfect. But I am not human.

data.name: Kayn
data.title: the Shadow Reaper
data.quote: The child is gone. The killer remains.

data.name: Kennen
data.title: the Heart of the Tempest
data.quote: I exist across realms, in the space between lightning’s strike and thunder’s call, the true balance within the storm.

data.name: Kha'Zix
data.title: the Voidreaver
data.quote: Kill. Consume. Adapt.

data.name: Kindred
data.title: The Eternal Hunters
data.quote: Tell me again, little Lamb, which things are ours to take? All things, dear Wolf.

data.name: Kled
data.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
data.quote: A sane man would run… but I ain’t the runnin’ kind!

data.name: Kog'Maw
data.title: the Mouth of the Abyss
data.quote: If that's just hungry, I don't want to see angry.

data.name: K'Sante
data.title: the Pride of Nazumah
data.quote: No monster greater than pride.

data.name: LeBlanc
data.title: the Deceiver
data.quote: A rose cannot grow in darkness. It dies, and the darkness grows…

data.name: Lee Sin
data.title: the Blind Monk
data.quote: Enlightenment is knowing the value of one’s ignorance.

data.name: Leona
data.title: the Radiant Dawn
data.quote: By the light of the Sun, the world is beheld.

data.name: Lillia
data.title: the Bashful Bloom
data.quote: When the humans bloom, it’s so beautiful… I can help them! Maybe. Possibly? Perhaps…

data.name: Lissandra
data.title: the Ice Witch
data.quote: So many secrets, buried in ice...

data.name: Lucian
data.title: the Purifier
data.quote: Wield the light, endure the pain, and cleanse all shadow from this world.

data.name: Lulu
data.title: the Fae Sorceress
data.quote: The best path between two points is upside-down, between, then inside-out and round again.

data.name: Lux
data.title: the Lady of Luminosity
data.quote: The light inside is what makes me different, and I’m always careful where I shine it.

data.name: Malphite
data.title: Shard of the Monolith
data.quote: Beware, minions of chaos! The Shard of the Monolith has come.

data.name: Malzahar
data.title: the Prophet of the Void
data.quote: We are timeless. We demand sacrifice.

data.name: Maokai
data.title: the Twisted Treant
data.quote: All around me are empty husks, soulless and unafraid... but I will bring them fear.

data.name: Maestro Yi
data.title: the Wuju Bladesman
data.quote: The edge of the sharpest blade is no match for the calm of the peaceful mind.

data.name: Miss Fortune
data.title: the Bounty Hunter
data.quote: The bigger the risk, the bigger the bounty.

data.name: Wukong
data.title: the Monkey King
data.quote: My journey is only beginning…

data.name: Mordekaiser
data.title: the Iron Revenant
data.quote: Destiny. Domination. Deceit.

data.name: Morgana
data.title: the Fallen
data.quote: Only those you love can break your heart.

data.name: Nami
data.title: the Tidecaller
data.quote: I decide what the tide will bring.

data.name: Nasus
data.title: the Curator of the Sands
data.quote: For centuries, I have watched. We approach a time of reckoning.

data.name: Nautilus
data.title: the Titan of the Depths
data.quote: When consumed by utter darkness, there is nothing left but forward.

data.name: Neeko
data.title: the Curious Chameleon
data.quote: The Oovi-Kat are gone. Neeko must build her own tribe, now.

data.name: Nidalee
data.title: the Bestial Huntress
data.quote: The untamed know no fear.

data.name: Nilah
data.title: the Joy Unbound
data.quote: Bliss in life, and bliss forever after.

data.name: Nocturne
data.title: the Eternal Nightmare
data.quote: The darkness is closing in...

data.name: Nunu y Willump
data.title: the Boy and His Yeti
data.quote: Pull the fur outta your earholes, Willump! This is gonna be the bestest story ever!

data.name: Olaf
data.title: the Berserker
data.quote: When you meet your ancestors, tell them Olaf sent you.

data.name: Orianna
data.title: the Lady of Clockwork
data.quote: When a moth emerges from its chrysalis, does it remember its life as a caterpillar?

data.name: Ornn
data.title: The Fire below the Mountain
data.quote: I have said enough.

data.name: Pantheon
data.title: the Unbreakable Spear
data.quote: Here is my eternity… a day the gods will remember!

data.name: Poppy
data.title: Keeper of the Hammer
data.quote: I’m no hero. Just a yordle with a hammer.

data.name: Pyke
data.title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
data.quote: There’s plenty of room for everyone at the bottom of the sea...

data.name: Qiyana
data.title: Empress of the Elements
data.quote: Some day, all this will be Ixaocan. A glorious empire, with an empress to fit.

data.name: Quinn
data.title: Demacia's Wings
data.quote: Most soldiers only rely on their weapons. Few truly rely on each other.

data.name: Rakan
data.title: The Charmer
data.quote: I got freedom. I got a lady. I got a cause I'd die for.

data.name: Rammus
data.title: the Armordillo
data.quote: OK.

data.name: Rek'Sai
data.title: the Void Burrower
data.quote: Fear not ambush from the hills, nor winged beasts from the skies. The true terror of Shurima comes from the sand, and gives no warning of her presence.

data.name: Rell
data.title: the Iron Maiden
data.quote: Forge your heart into something strong. Unbreakable.

data.name: Renata Glasc
data.title: the Chem-Baroness
data.quote: We don't have to be enemies. Let me change your mind.

data.name: Renekton
data.title: the Butcher of the Sands
data.quote: Blood! And vengeance!

data.name: Rengar
data.title: the Pridestalker
data.quote: Prey on the weak and you may survive. Prey on the strong and you will truly live.

data.name: Riven
data.title: the Exile
data.quote: A warrior’s blade reflects the truth in their heart. Mine is black, and broken.

data.name: Rumble
data.title: the Mechanized Menace
data.quote: Ugh, it's gonna take forever to scrape your face off my suit!

data.name: Ryze
data.title: the Rune Mage
data.quote: Take care with this world. What is made can be unmade.

data.name: Samira
data.title: the Desert Rose
data.quote: Virtues, I've got a few. Vices, a few more.

data.name: Sejuani
data.title: Fury of the North
data.quote: I was cut from the ice. Shaped by the storms. Hardened in the cold.

data.name: Senna
data.title: the Redeemer
data.quote: As shadows embrace the light, I will embrace them...

data.name: Seraphine
data.title: the Starry-Eyed Songstress
data.quote: This one’s for you!

data.name: Sett
data.title: the Boss
data.quote: Bein’ the boss… is a lot better than not bein’ the boss.

data.name: Shaco
data.title: the Demon Jester
data.quote: Whatever you do, don't tell him you missed the punch line.

data.name: Shen
data.title: the Eye of Twilight
data.quote: The Eye is blind to fear, to hate, to love – to all things that would sway equilibrium.

data.name: Shyvana
data.title: the Half-Dragon
data.quote: I am of two worlds, yet I belong to neither.

data.name: Singed
data.title: the Mad Chemist
data.quote: You mustn’t die yet; I have far too much to learn from your fragile anatomy.

data.name: Sion
data.title: The Undead Juggernaut
data.quote: War is eternal... as am I.

data.name: Sivir
data.title: the Battle Mistress
data.quote: Coin may buy you skill for a day, but never loyalty.

data.name: Skarner
data.title: the Crystal Vanguard
data.quote: We are one. We cannot be shattered.

data.name: Sona
data.title: Maven of the Strings
data.quote: My spies whisper to me of this Ionian treasure—that her melody moves the soul, and her silence sunders the body.

data.name: Soraka
data.title: the Starchild
data.quote: Two paths lie before you, but you can only take one.

data.name: Swain
data.title: the Noxian Grand General
data.quote: I have learned enough to detest all men. Only nations may be revered.

data.name: Sylas
data.title: the Unshackled
data.quote: I am no traitor. I am the true Demacia.

data.name: Syndra
data.title: the Dark Sovereign
data.quote: My potential is limitless. I will not be restrained.

data.name: Tahm Kench
data.title: The River King
data.quote: The whole world's a river, and I'm its king.

data.name: Taliyah
data.title: the Stoneweaver
data.quote: This world is a tapestry of our own making.

data.name: Talon
data.title: the Blade's Shadow
data.quote: The three deadliest blademasters in all of Valoran are bound to the house of Du Couteau: my father, myself, and Talon. Challenge us, if you dare.

data.name: Taric
data.title: the Shield of Valoran
data.quote: The best weapons are beautiful.

data.name: Teemo
data.title: the Swift Scout
data.quote: Teemo rides a thin line between chipper compatriot and unrepentant killer, but there's no one else I'd rather have as a friend.

data.name: Thresh
data.title: the Chain Warden
data.quote: The mind is a wondrous thing to tear apart.

data.name: Tristana
data.title: the Yordle Gunner
data.quote: Boomer says hi.

data.name: Trundle
data.title: the Troll King
data.quote: Outsmart anyone you can't beat, and beat anyone you can't outsmart.

data.name: Tryndamere
data.title: the Barbarian King
data.quote: Rage is my weapon.

data.name: Twisted Fate
data.title: the Card Master
data.quote: It's not gambling if you can't lose...

data.name: Twitch
data.title: the Plague Rat
data.quote: They threw this away? But it’s so shiny!

data.name: Udyr
data.title: the Spirit Walker
data.quote: I can taste our enemies' hunger for victory. Let them starve.

data.name: Urgot
data.title: the Dreadnought
data.quote: There is only one way to measure a man. Tear him… into… pieces.

data.name: Varus
data.title: the Arrow of Retribution
data.quote: You didn’t destroy us all. And that mistake will be your undoing.

data.name: Vayne
data.title: the Night Hunter
data.quote: I don’t kill creatures like you because it’s the right thing to do. I kill you because I enjoy it.

data.name: Veigar
data.title: the Tiny Master of Evil
data.quote: You deny the darkness in your soul...

data.name: Vel'Koz
data.title: the Eye of the Void
data.quote: Only by deconstruction is truth revealed.

data.name: Vex
data.title: the Gloomist
data.quote: Just... ughhhhh.

data.name: Vi
data.title: the Piltover Enforcer
data.quote: We can either do this the hard way or… Oh wait, no. There's just the hard way.

data.name: Viego
data.title: The Ruined King
data.quote: No price is too great. No atrocity beyond my reach. For her... I will do anything.

data.name: Viktor
data.title: the Machine Herald
data.quote: A mechanized heart never misses a beat, and never falters with emotion. So why would anyone trust their life to a fragile muscle of flesh and blood?

data.name: Vladimir
data.title: the Crimson Reaper
data.quote: Time has made me wiser, but no more patient.

data.name: Volibear
data.title: the Relentless Storm
data.quote: They have forgotten the old ways. The old ways have not forgotten them.

data.name: Warwick
data.title: the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun
data.quote: Spill blood... draw the beast!

data.name: Xayah
data.title: the Rebel
data.quote: Ever been stabbed by a feather?

data.name: Xerath
data.title: the Magus Ascendant
data.quote: A lifetime as a slave has prepared me for eternity as your master.

data.name: Xin Zhao
data.title: the Seneschal of Demacia
data.quote: Death is inevitable. One can only avoid defeat.

data.name: Yasuo
data.title: the Unforgiven
data.quote: Death is like the wind—always by my side.

data.name: Yone
data.title: the Unforgotten
data.quote: They look at me and see only the mask. I look at them and see only their fears.

data.name: Yorick
data.title: Shepherd of Souls
data.quote: These isles… How they scream.

data.name: Yuumi
data.title: the Magical Cat
data.quote: Cats are made of twilight and tricks, dogs are made of barks and sticks! Book’s just old trees.

data.name: Zac
data.title: the Secret Weapon
data.quote: The angrier you get, the more this is going to hurt...

data.name: Zed
data.title: the Master of Shadows
data.quote: Balance is a fool’s master.

data.name: Zeri
data.title: The Spark of Zaun
data.quote: I belong here. We all belong here.

data.name: Ziggs
data.title: the Hexplosives Expert
data.quote: Ziggs? Unpredictable, dangerous, yes yes. But quite brilliant!

data.name: Zilean
data.title: the Chronokeeper
data.quote: There is no greater grief than for a loss that is yet to come.

data.name: Zoe
data.title: the Aspect of Twilight
data.quote: I bring a message for you all—a warning, a sigil. But first, I wanna see the sparkleflies!

data.name: Zyra
data.title: Rise of the Thorns
data.quote: Where are your friends? Mine are all around…
